entry.title: Add new page in Octopress
entry.content:
If you want to add new page in Octopress, just like Octopress's build-in "Blog" and "Archives" link. Firstly, you should create new page that you want. $> rake new_page["about"] Then, Octopress engine will create the following fold and file: mkdir -p source/about Creating new page: source/about/index.markdown

Secondly, you should edit "source/_includes/custom/navigation.html" file as following: ```html

  • Blog
  • Archives
  • About

```

Last, you could add about informaton in "source/about/index.markdown" and run: $rake generate $rake deploy You will find "About" in navigation bar. :)
